text:
video demonstration on ventouse delivery 
Forceps delivery 
• F orceps  delivery should only be performed in hospitals, by experienced operators, where all conditions for
forceps delivery are met.
• If a ventouse has had to be abandoned despite functioning equipment, do not then attempt delivery by forceps as
this is likely to cause excessive morbidity for mother and baby. Opt for a caesarean section in this circumstance.
Emergencies during labour 
CORD PROLAPSE 
• In cord prolapse, the umbilic
